column4: hey there, just installed ubuntu and it seems very nice. I'm completly new to linux so i have a question.. I installed ubuntu on the same hdd as my windows, but i cant seem to find my windows files. They are there but i cant find em from my ubuntu installation. Why is this?
linux and windows use different file systems
you can read, but not write, files from your windows system
see the link ubotu sent to you
